mapper.select: select r.*, e.name emp_name, m.name room_name, m.location from room_booking r join meeting_room m on r.room_seq = m.room_seq join employee e on r.emp_no = e.emp_no where r.room_seq = #{roomSeq}

select count(*) from room_booking where room_seq = #{room_seq} and ( (start_date between #{start_date} and #{end_date}) or (end_date between #{start_date} and #{end_date}) or (start_date <= #{start_date} and end_date >= #{end_date}) )
